file_content.text: The temple is amazing. You'll see.
Hey, Padawan! You must be the one Master Yuon mentioned, must be!
If we weren't Jedi, I would say I could tell because you are as cute as described. But we are Jedi, so I will say nothing of the sort.
Isn't Tython amazing? Scary too, don't get me wrong, but wow. I mean, look at this place!
Master Yuon said to remind you that she says a Jedi needs to learn martial skills and said that I should say you should.
And who will train me in these martial skills?
Thank you for passing along the message. Was there anything else?
Not really the calm and collected Padawan ideal, are you?
First week. Just found I was Force sensitive. How crazy is that?
Go see Master Wettle in the temple. Doesn't look like much, but he'll show you stuff you wouldn't believe. Good luck--may the Force be with you!
Did I have something to tell you? Hmm, maybe not.
